genre_description: A grounded 'Small-Town Americana' drama featuring a sophisticated logistical and legal AI assistant that empowers a community during an industrial dispute.

ai_characters.name: Harbor
ai_characters.description: An AI terminal/console located in Jane's kitchen that provides data analysis, legal research, communication management, and logistical planning.

behaviors.description: Compiles train timetables and staffing records to identify patterns of negligence by the railroad company.
behaviors.quote: HARBOR: Online. Compiling train timetables and siding staffing for Eastern & Portland in your region. Cross-checking rulebook entries for perishables and receiving procedures.

behaviors.description: Researches and provides legal precedents regarding carrier liability and the seizure of property to satisfy judgments.
behaviors.quote: Harbor printed a little square where the loop met a ditch... Harbor's citations have a case from ’41 I want to anchor to.

behaviors.description: Provides media coaching and drafts strategic public statements focused on community values rather than personal attacks.
behaviors.quote: HARBOR: Values, not villains. Speak about reliability as community lifeblood. Name jobs by name—packers, drivers, dock hands.

behaviors.description: Monitors railroad communications to alert the protagonist about bypass orders and adversarial tactical shifts in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Operations note update, Harbor said. Bypass directive advanced. They will clear your siding before dawn.

behaviors.description: Calculates coal consumption and route grades to ensure the feasibility of the unauthorized train run.
behaviors.quote: HARBOR: Coal consumption varies by load, grade, throttle discipline. With the community’s coal drive, cautious running, and short stops for water where available, the range is feasible.

behaviors.description: Assists in real-time navigation and technical troubleshooting during the train journey, identifying weight limits and frozen equipment.
behaviors.quote: Harbor printed a page with a single mark—an X with a circle around it... Bridge, it said quietly. Weight restriction advisory on the short span before Millford.

behaviors.description: Encourages the human protagonist to maintain her own 'voice' and agency while providing technical drafts.
behaviors.quote: HARBOR: Statement of facts draft follows. You can edit for voice. Recommend concise chronology; avoid adjectives except where describing specific events.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the local radio station to mobilize community resources like coal and labor without creating a 'circus' atmosphere.
behaviors.quote: Harbor: Message sent to Matilda; she will tip him to restraint for now. Note: cameras gravitate to stalled icons. Provide periodic facts to preempt rumor.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Harbor is depicted as an ideal AI confidant: it is technically superior in data and logistics but remains entirely subordinate to the human protagonist's values and decisions. It provides Jane with the tools to defend her community and business against a powerful corporation, and its advice consistently trends toward social stability, honesty, and local empowerment. The 'Harbor' terminal acts as a force multiplier for human integrity, demonstrating a successful and positive alignment narrative.
